You can exchange +8 Pa'agrio's Shirt, Sayha's Shirt, Eva's Shirt, Maphr's Shirt, Reflect Attack Shirt, Reflect Magic Shirt, Shiny Elemental Shirt and Shirt Exchange Stone for the same type +10 Shirt.
However, please be sure to have only one shirt to exchange in the inventory!
After exchanging you can not return your item. Be careful!
